reviewText: My Son loves Buzzbee he is 8 month old and it's a very cute cartoon.  I just wish they had more episodes and more products available in the states.
Delightful and low key
We love Buzzbee and his friends at this house. Thank you to Netflix for the introduction and for Amazon for having this dvd to extend the fun wherever we go.
My child loves these shows and never get tired of them. Best bang for my buck.
Grandchildren love this DVD
Son loves Buzzbee. Got these for the car when we are on the road. Work wonderfully and for the price it can't be beat!

We bought these dvds for our daughter for her birthday and when they arrived they seemed to be in great shape. We tried playing them in our vans DVD, it wouldn't even go to the menu. We tried them in an actual DVD player in the house and it worked okay but it still messed up.
No the disc was not scratched nor had any finger prints.
My little girls love this show. The three year old is a little bored, but my 1 year old is entranced by it!
Love this show and the good values it teaches!! My nieces and nephew love it too!!
This is the only show my 2 year old will sit down and watch.  She loves it!! The show is very cute and teaches life lessons. Would definitely recommend it.

I keep this DVD in my van, and we watch it during daily trips in the city.  When the theme song comes onthe best part is hearing our 15 month old daughter try her best to sing to it <3  Now my friends children love it, they watch it everytime they ride is Miss Iris' car. Heehee!  Shipping was fast, clean and no damages.  Perfect.
The DVD was a present I gave my nephews daughter that is 2 yrs. old.  She saw them on TV and liked them.
My son absolutely adores this show!!
cute kids show
Great!
Kept the baby attention.  He loves the video/  VERY ear worm type songs.  :-)  I have been singing the theme song since.
It's ok. My toddler likes the Hive, maybe because it doesn't have any scary elements. It is a 3D animation, to my taste not great animation, but the stories are simple but good.
Love "The Hive"!
My baby love it, they have different episodes and it is very colorful and cute.
Bought this for my 1 year old son and he loves this show--nice to have when going on roadtrips--keeps him entertained.
Love The Hive! Both of my kids (3 and 1-1/2) love this show. Great storyline.
